name: What  would a lvl guide look like for a pally16/Monk20/BG4?
author: campgod

posts.author: campgod
posts.content: I would like it for PvP, lvl 40. Would it be a duel Kama,single with no shield or unarmed? Race doesnt matter to me but I am guess Human is best? I have never really tried a pally so not sure of the starting stats or anything would be. If anyone has any ideas or can lay it out for me I would really appreciate it,thanks. The Alignment Change will not be hard to get as well.

posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content:
Depends on when/how you want him to mature, how many alignment changes, etc.

For max BAB and minimum alignment shifts, go PAL 1-16, BG 17-20 and Monk the rest of the way. You get the Paladin spellbook open quickly, but miss out on free cleave, evasion, tumble dumps, etc., plus cannot max taunt.

The playablility build (IMO) is
1 PAL
2 MO (cleave and 5 hide for BG)
3 PAL
4 PAL
5 PAL
6 PAL
7 MO
8 BG (alignment shift)
9 BG - dark blessing so you double cha bonus to saves
10 BG
11 BG - sneak
12 MO
13 PAL (last alignment shift)
14 PAL
15 PAL
16 PAL
17 MO
18 PAL
19 PAL
20 PAL

And then in Epic, its 16 MO 4 PAL in any order, depending on where you want certain bonus feats.

If you start

STR - 14 (all increases here)
DEX - 10
CON - 14
WIS - 14
INT - 12
CHA - 14

You'd look AB 40 with no GR STR feats and WF/EWF/EP. You'll have stacking Bull's with PAL & BG, Bless, Aid, GMW and (vs evil) Holy Sword & Smite Evil as decent buffs,

The best monk stuff (Empty Body, Perfect Self) comes extremely late, but he should be a tough cookie.

posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content:
campgod wrote:
Great thanks for your time and help!! If any more ideas come please throw them my way. What weapon would you go with on this build? Single Kama?
I'm a Single kama guy unless multiclassing with Ranger on strength builds.  Otherwise you have to invest in Dex, Ambidextery, TWF & ITWF.

Let's say you have a STR based monk with a DEX of 14.

You can have an attack schedule of 43/40/37/34/31/28 with a single kama or 41/38/35/32/29/26/41/38 with dual kamas.  On the face of it, the two extra attacks are worth the (-2) AB.  However, if you look at what you could do with the investment of 1 ability point and 3 feats (depending on how you build it)::

A) 1 STR + 3 GRSTR = 2 AB, so attack schedule is 45/42/39/36/33/30

B) 1 STR + 1 GRSTR + BF + Toughness = 1 AB, 40 HP and protection vs. sneaks/invisible

C) 1 STR + 1 GRSTR + EWF + EP = 4 AB

D) 1 CON + Toughness + GRCON + Epic Fort = 80 HP + 3 Fort save.
